ALL DAY MOISTURE? IT’S A THING.

No more reapplying between showers. This ultra-hydrating body lotion is infused with Shea Butter and Argan Oil to lock in moisture that lasts all day.

FOR BEST USE

Apply immediately after showering to seal in moisture.

Key Ingredients

  • Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) - Proven to reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone, dry skin, and rough texture.
  • Vitamin E - Helps prevent dry, itchy, flaking skin by promoting healing and moisturization.
  • Shea Butter - Used for generations as a deep, non-greasy moisturizer that quickly absorbs into the skin. Shea Butter is also known to reduce scarring, uneven skin tones, and dark spots.
  • Argan Oil - Packed with Vitamin E, omega fatty acids, and linoleic acids, which work hard to moisturize and soften your skin without leaving a sticky residue or causing irritation.

Made Without

Harsh, Drying chemicals

Full Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Polyethylene, Panthenol, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Behenyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Dimethiconol, Propylparaben, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Disodium Edta, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil.
